question: The National Origin-Based Antidiscrimination for Non-immigrants (NO BAN) Act has recently been reintroduced in which country?
explanation:
The National Origin-Based Antidiscrimination for Non-immigrants (NO BAN) Act was reintroduced at the US House of Representatives by the Democratic lawmakers.
The aim of this proposed legislation is to prevent future Muslim ban and prohibit religion-based discrimination. This law is a counter to the Muslim travel ban introduced by the former US President Donald Trump.
